summary: This module implements a CUDA accelerator for Lightning Fabric, encapsulating GPU device discovery, selection, and configuration. It defines a class that integrates with the Fabric accelerator registry, handling device placement, precision settings, and memory management for NVIDIA GPUs. The module also offers utility functions to query CUDA availability, count visible devices, clear GPU memory, and assess hardware capabilities such as Ampere architecture support and matrix multiplication precision.
